column5: CIDM McGurk expects the Future Today deal to close by the end of the month Future Today with its founders ties to India they are iIndians opens up an enormous market couple that with China This could be a very interesting ride

CIDM The LD Micro was an amazing presentation by McGurk To see it only up a penny is just wrong Without question One of the Most Undervalued companies on the market Did I hear 50 compounded growth rate for Future Today HUGE
CIDM My favorite slide from the LD Micro presentation
CIDM with ROKU going nuts with increasing userbase CIDM should benefit no
CIDM The month of June looks like it should be a GREAT month given everything falls into place

Comparison of NFLX and CIDM Interesting to see Cinedigm has out performed Netflix year to date You could buy 175 shares of Cinedigm for every 1 share of Netflix Cinedigm has a game changer in their buy of Future Today which should close this month Cinedigm at LD Micro conference today 1pm est Cinedigm the NFLX of China

CIDM ROKU Comparison of ROKU and CIDM PURPLE LINE Roku near 100 and CIDM near 2 You can own 50 shares of CIDM for every share of ROKUAND CIDMs buyout of Future Today is game changer Interesting as good as ROKU has beenCInedigm has been just as strong year to date
CIDM ROKU Roku is nailing it Cinedigms CombatGo and Wham are on Rokus ad supported linear platform Good stuff
